name: Nioh 2 Season Pass
summary:
Unleash your darkness

Raise your blade, masocore warrior… for your fight is not yet over.

Experience the brutal stories leading into the events of Nioh 2 with this Season Pass – which will give you access to three upcoming add-on packs as soon as they're released.

Each pack features hours of brand-new missions and side-quests, along with new content including deadly weapons to wield, combat abilities to unleash and characters to interact with.

Death is coming. Again.
